name: Damage Reduction
description: All Physical Damage (Damage that either targets your Evasion, Reflexes, or Might to hit, or is physical in nature) is reduced by this much.

name: Armor Strength Requirement
description: You require at least 1 Strength to wear this Armor effectively.

name: Armor Agility Requirement
description: You require at least 1 Vitality to wear this Armor effectively. Adding this property must be approved by the RM

name: Armor Vitality Requirement
description: You require at least 1 Vitality to wear this Armor effectively. Adding this property must be approved by the RM

name: Agility Reduction
description: You reduce at your Agility by 1 while wearing this Armor.

name: Weapon Strength Requirement
description: You require at least 1 Strength to wield this Weapon with proficiency.

name: Weapon Agility Requirement
description: You require at least 1 Agility to wield this Weapon with proficiency.

name: Weapon Vitality Requirement
description: You require at least 1 Vitality to wield this Weapon with proficiency. Adding this property must be approved by the RM

name: Weapon Acuity Requirement
description: You require at least 1 Acuity to wield this Weapon with proficiency.

name: Weapon Intelligence Requirement
description: You require at least 1 Intelligence to wield this Weapon with proficiency. Adding this property must be approved by the RM

name: Weapon Charisma Requirement
description: You require at least 1 Charisma to wield this Weapon with proficiency. Adding this property must be approved by the RM

name: Split Damage Dice
description: A 'Split' damage dice is when dice could be represented by less dice of greater size, but are 'split' into smaller sizes instead. Ie 2d6 instead of 1d12 represents one die 'split' by splitting 1d12 into 2d6.
op_1_desc: Each additional time a die is split, ie 3d4 instead of 1d12 is 2 splits instead of 1, this property increases by one.

name: Range
description: Increases the weapon's range by 8 spaces per level (level starts at 1 for the first increment).

name: Two-Handed
description: Changes the weapon to two-handed, reducing item points but increasing training and gold points.

name: Shield Base
description: Base cost applied to all shields.

name: Armor Base
description: Base cost applied to all armor.

name: Weapon Damage
description: Add 1d4 piercing, Bludgeoning, or slashing damage to this weapon.

name: Damage Type Resistance
description: Your Armor Reduction is double against these damage types.

name: Bludgeoning Vulnerability
description: Bludgeoning damage is not reduced at all by this Armor.

name: Piercing Vulnerability
description: Piercing damage is not reduced at all by this Armor.

name: Slashing Vulnerability
description: Slashing damage is not reduced at all by this Armor.

name: Critical Range +1
description: Increase your critical range against damage types reduced by the Armor by 1, and resisted by the Armor by 2.
op_1_desc: Increase critical range by an additional +1/+2.

name: Critical Range
description: Reduce the critical range of this Weapon by 1.

name: Critical Multiplier
description: The critical damage multiplier increases by 1. (3x damage rather than 2x, and so on)

name: Thrown
description: You may throw this Weapon (dealing a different damage type than it's default if you choose) up to 3 spaces away using Strength for the attack roll and damage.

name: Finesse
description: This Weapon uses Agility for attack and damage rolls instead of another ability.

name: Damaged
description: This Weapon is damaged and thus is cheaper.

name: Graze
description: When missing non-critically with this Weapon you still deal damage of the Weapons type equal to half of your attack bonus.
op_1_desc: Increase once to make this equal your full attack bonus instead.

name: Loading
description: This Weapon requires an interaction to load before it can be used to attack with.

name: Knockback
description: After successfully hitting with this Weapon you may knock the target hit back 1 space, they must roll Might or Reflex against your Martial Potency to overcome.
op_1_desc: +1 space for each increase of this property up to 3 spaces knocked back.

name: Wounding
description: When you successfully deal damage with this Weapon target rolls Fortitude against your Martial Potency gaining Weakened 1 on failure.

name: Slow
description: When you successfully deal damage with this Weapon target rolls Fortitude or Might (your choice upon weapon creation) against your Martial Potency gaining Slow 1 on failure.

name: Topple
description: After successfully hitting with this Weapon you may knock the target rolls Might or Reflex (your choice upon weapon creation) against your Martial Potency becoming Prone on failure.

name: Expose
description: After successfully hitting with this Weapon target rolls Might against your Martial Potency gaining Exposed 1 on failure.

name: Charging
description: If you move at least 4 spaces toward the target before attacking, add +1 to this attack attack and damage rolls.

name: Hidden
description: As an Interaction plus Ability Roll action, hide this Weapon with the Slight of Hand Skill against target's Discernment, if hidden from an enemy when you attack get +2 on the roll to hit and damage.

name: Ammunition
description: This Weapon requires ammunition, which deals the same damage as the Weapon, the Weapon cannot be used for ranged attacks without ammunition. The Ammunition costs 1/8 of the weapon's cost for a bundle of 10 pieces.

name: Bleed
description: When you successfully deal damage with this Weapon target rolls Fortitude against your Martial Potency gaining Bleed 1 on failure.
op_1_desc: Increase the level of Bleed by 1.

name: Shield Amount
description: As a Defend Reaction, you can reduce the damage dealt by an attack by 1d4 + Martial Bonus.

name: Shield Damage
description: This Shield can deal 1d4 Bludgeoning damage as a melee Weapon attack. Shields with this property are considered Interchangeable

name: Reach
description: The melee range of this Weapon is 1 additional space.
op_1_desc: Increase melee range of this weapon by 1 additional space.

name: Mounted
description: This Weapon deals an additional 1d4 while mounted.

name: Versatile
description: This can be wielded with 2 hands or with 1 hand, but adds 1d2 more to all damage dice when wielded with 2. (Add only to a 'One-Handed' weapon.)

name: Cleave
description: This Weapon hits 2 connected spaces within your melee range when attacking. Roll your attack and damage once.
op_1_desc: Increase cleave to hit an additional connected space.

name: Interchangeable
description: This Weapon can be wielded by itself or with another Weapon with the interchangeable feat of dual-wielded Weapons.

name: Block
description: As a Quick Reaction you may make an attack roll with this Weapon against another melee Weapon attack made within your melee range. If you exceed the attack roll of the triggering attack, you prevent the attack from hitting.

name: Quick
description: The multiple attack penalty for this Weapon is -4 for each additional attack.

name: Pull
description: When you successfully hit with this Weapon you may cause the target to roll Might against your Martial Potency, getting pulled one space closer upon failure.
